GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.21 to before v4.9.331
GSD.description:
usb: mon: make mmapped memory read only

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.331 by commit 1b5ad3786a2f2cdbfed34071aa467f80e4903a0b, it was introduced in version v2.6.21 by commit 6f23ee1fefdc1f80bd8a3ab04a1c41ab2dec14c9. For more details please see the references link.
